text: Rally Championship is a rally video game. It was released for PlayStation 2 on 31 May 2002 and GameCube on 7 February 2003. It is developed by Warthog Games and published by SCi. The game is a sequel to the 2001 game Rally Championship Xtreme. There are 6 different locations (Wales, Scotland, Isle of Man, USA, the Arctic and Kenya), with 4 tracks for each location. title: Rally Championship (video game)
